author: cms-sw
body: Currently when one sets up a tool (`scram setup <tool>`) then scram only updates the tool information but does not create `external/$SCRAM_ARCH` symlinks. These symlinks are only created when one checks out/adds any sources to build and run `scram build`. Changes in https://github.com/cms-sw/SCRAM/commit/3e481c9f139604424fc8fa1872fdacd99af9fe98#diff-dcc66ec8ccccf1efdc345c110d38965e3064c8c1053b395f6b3d1b433e6a69c9R96 should allow `scram setup` to also generate these symlinks if needed
title: [SCRAM] scram setup to create external symlinks
